subject_labels: IAM least-privilege policies with explicit denies
RDS encryption with customer-managed KMS keys
VPC peering with route table configuration
description: Multi-region payment processing infrastructure migration from eu-central-2 to eu-west-1 using CDKTF with Python. Create complete VPC infrastructure in both regions with cross-region VPC peering, encrypted RDS PostgreSQL, DynamoDB with PITR, Lambda functions with reserved concurrency, API Gateway HTTP API, S3 with cross-region replication, and CloudWatch monitoring. All resources must use environment_suffix for naming.
author: mayanksethi-turing
